text: Photos that surfaced of Rihanna in what looks like an argument with her maybe-boyfriend Hassan Jameel in Mexico immediately set the BIG MOOD for this week. Posted by The Shade Room, the paparazzi shot shows the singer mid-sentence in a passionate conversation, pointing her finger at the billionaire. Jameel is reacting exactly how one should react if Rihanna were to yell at you. He is leaning away, letting her speak her piece.
